title: Chicago: midland metropolis

description: Describes the physical and social characteristics of a metropolitan region as exemplified by Chicago. Shows how the people live and work, explains why the Chicago region became a major urban area, and examines some of the critical problems of urban development and the efforts of city planners to solve them.
